mapper.sql: id as id, teach_time as teachTime, ten_id as tenId, create_time as createTime, tid as tid
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_teach_time ( teach_time, ten_id, create_time, tid ) VALUES ( #{teachTime}, #{tenId}, #{createTime}, #{tid} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_teach_time
teach_time = #{teachTime},
ten_id = #{tenId},
create_time = #{createTime},
tid = #{tid},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_teach_time
teach_time = #{map.teachTime},
ten_id = #{map.tenId},
create_time = #{map.createTime},
tid = #{map.tid},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_jw_teach_time ( teach_time, ten_id, create_time, tid ) VALUES ( #{map.teachTime}, #{map.tenId}, #{map.createTime}, #{map.tid} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_teach_time
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND teach_time like CONCAT('%', #{teachTime} , '%')
AND ten_id like CONCAT('%', #{tenId} , '%')
AND create_time like CONCAT('%', #{createTime} , '%')
AND tid like CONCAT('%', #{tid} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
